text:
Sourcefabric | Europe | possibly Remote

We are looking to hire a Python specialist who care about good quality software for a position as APPLICATION DEVELOPER (BACKEND) for the SUPERDESK project.

Superdesk is an end-to-end news creation, production, curation, distribution and publishing platform. Superdesk is built by a non profit organisation, Sourcefabric, that builds a variety of open source tools for media organisations all over the world.

Find the job ad here: https://www.sourcefabric.org/en/home/jobs/3440/Application-D...
